name: CinEx Forerunner
short_description:
CinEx Forerunner is the combination out of the CinEx SoundTouch solution, that was stolen by a popular company. 
With CinEx Forerunner you will find:
- Wobber: The original CinEx SoundTouch now with parameters
- Revealer: to re-enable the deactivated watermark with standard parameters.
- Wobbler2: The improved version of the wobbler with dynamic wobble.

Because the code was allready stolen from us we decided to make this code open source under then GPL. 

LICENSE: Do not forget, this is GPL and not LGPL. The usage in a commercial software will cause to release your complete software under GPL. To get a license for a commercial software, without the need to publish, just check http://www.cinexhd.com/cinex-hd-sdk/

The complete watermark removing solution you can find on http://www.cinexhd.com

Keywords: Cinavia, Blu-ray, Torrent
